from __future__ import absolute_import
from __future__ import division
from __future__ import print_function
from __future__ import unicode_literals


[docs]class TestError(Exception):


[docs]    def __init__(self, message="Test Error"):
        self.message = message


    def __str__(self):
        return "[HAVOC TEST ERROR] %s" % self.message




[docs]class TestStepError(Exception):


[docs]    def __init__(self, message="Test Step Error"):
        self.message = message


    def __str__(self):
        return "[HAVOC TEST STEP ERROR] %s" % self.message




[docs]class CmdError(Exception):


[docs]    def __init__(self, command, result_obj, additional_text=None):
        self.command = command
        self.result_obj = result_obj
        self.additional_text = additional_text


    def __str__(self):
        msg = "Command <%s> failed, rc=%d" % (
            self.command, self.result_obj.return_code
        )
        if self.additional_text:
            msg += ", " + self.additional_text
        msg += "\n%s" % (self.result_obj.stdout + self.result_obj.stderr)
        return "[HAVOC CMD ERROR] %s" % msg




[docs]class TimeoutError(Exception):

[docs]    def __init__(self, message="Timeout Error"):
        self.message = message


    def __str__(self):
        return "[HAVOC TIMEOUT ERROR] %s" % self.message
